cards.title: Burgess
powers: Discard the top two cards of your deck. Put any Clues discarded this way into play or into your hand. Draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
Increase projectile damage dealt by hero targets by 1 until the start of your next turn.
One hero may use a power now.

cards.title: A Questionable Source
body: When this card enters play, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Clue card, you may put it into play or in your hand. Then draw a card.
powers: {BurgessCharacter} deals himself up to 4 psychic damage. For each point of damage he is dealt this way, draw a card. Then destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: No point in playing{BR}nice. This was your doing.{BR}You'll go down for this.
You're playing checkers on a chess{BR}board, Detective.

cards.title: Bastion PD Vest
body: The first time {BurgessCharacter} is dealt damage each turn, he regains 1 HP.
The first time {BurgessCharacter} is dealt projectile damage each turn, he regains 1 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: I want you boys to take{BR}Burgess on a little trip. Make{BR}sure he forgets his vest.

cards.title: Call for Backup
body: When this card enters play, discard any number of cards and draw a card for each card discarded this way. Then put any number of Backups from your hand into play.
At the end of your turn, you may destroy this card. Otherwise, you may put a Backup from your trash into play. Then discard X minus 2 cards, where X = the number of Backups in play.

flavorQuotes.text: Would someone please explain{BR}to me why Interpol is here?

cards.title: CI Report
body: When this card enters play, draw 2 cards.
powers: Put a Clue into play from your trash. Destroy this card.
Reveal cards from the top of your deck until a Clue is revealed. Put it into your hand or into play. Discard the remaining cards. Destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Didn't hear it from me, but{BR}your little trick made Brzezicki look{BR}weak in front of his men. Looking to make{BR}an example out of you.

cards.flavorReference: Mad Tom, Bastion City: The Coalition #9

cards.title: Cordoned Area
body: Destroy an environment or Ongoing card.

flavorQuotes.text: Just make sure to keep{BR}the perimeter secure. Last thing we{BR}need is more vigilantes thinking they{BR}understand police work.

cards.title: Dimpled Primer
body: Discard any number of cards. Increase the next damage dealt by Burgess by X plus 1, where X is the amount of cards discarded in this way.

flavorQuotes.text: How?!
An old... friend...{BR}taught me to be ready{BR}for anything.

cards.flavorReference: Division X: Fields of the Dead #8

cards.title: Forensic Analysis
body: The first time each turn a villain target deals damage, you may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Cause of death was... exsanguination.{BR}Huh.

cards.flavorReference: Burgess, Bastion's Best: Dark October One-Shot

cards.title: Hot Pursuit
body: Play this card next to a target that has dealt {BurgessCharacter} damage since the end of your last turn. When this card is not next to a target, destroy it. Redirect all damage dealt by that target to {BurgessCharacter} and increase that damage by 1.
powers: {BurgessCharacter} deals the target next to this card 3 projectile damage or destroys this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Why did I{BR}let you drive?
You can cry about it after{BR}we catch him.

cards.title: Looking Out
body: The first time each turn you draw a card, another player may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: You know you cannot vin, but still{BR}you fight... to protect your friends? Veak of{BR}body, but strong in spirit... Very well. I vill{BR}spare your friends. Take zem and depart.

cards.flavorReference: The Baroness, Bastion's Best: Black Thorn Academy #16

cards.title: Paper Trail
body: The first time a villain card enters play each turn, you may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: You have to be{BR}careful leaving paper trails, or you{BR}might get cut.
You're a funny guy, Burgess.{BR}Looking forward to talking about it at your{BR}funeral.

cards.title: Riding a Desk
body: When this card enters play, destroy [i]Hot Pursuit[/i] and [i]To Serve and Protect[/i]. Then {BurgessCharacter} regains 1 HP.
{BurgessCharacter} is immune to damage. You may not play cards or use powers. When a card would cause you to draw a card, prevent that draw.
At the start of your turn, {BurgessCharacter} regains 2 HP, then destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: You need some time to{BR}process what happened. Take it,{BR}or I take your badge.

cards.title: S9P Service Pistol
body: The first time each turn {BurgessCharacter} or a Backup is dealt damage, {BurgessCharacter} may deal the source of that damage 1 psychic or 2 projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Monsters, cults, the mob, dirty{BR}cops... I remember the days when I{BR}wondered if I'd ever even fire my weapon.{BR}How did this city go so wrong?

cards.title: SWAT Support
body: Reduce damage dealt to this card by 1. Once per turn when {BurgessCharacter} or a Backup deals a target damage, this card may deal that target 3 projectile damage. When this card enters play, discard up to 5 cards. Set this card's HP to twice the number of cards discarded.
powers: Discard a card. Increase damage dealt by {BurgessCharacter} and Backups by 1 until the start of your next turn.

flavorQuotes.text: False-Judges, meet your doom!

cards.title: Take 'Em
body: Once per round when {BurgessCharacter} or a Backup would deal damage, you may increase that damage by 1 plus the number of Backup in play. If damage is dealt this way, discard 3 cards or destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: She's got some sort{BR}of trigger. If she so much as{BR}breathes funny, you shoot first, shoot some{BR}more, and direct your questions to the coroner.

cards.title: To Serve and Protect
body: Play this card in another play area. When a target in this play area would take damage, you may redirect that damage to a target in your play area.
At the start of your turn, if you redirected damage this way since the start of your last turn, discard 3 cards or destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: You don't have to do{BR}this. We'll find another way.
It's done. I'll buy you time. Get{BR}the others out.

cards.title: Uniform
body: The first time each turn {BurgessCharacter} or a Backup is dealt damage, this card may deal the source of that damage 1 projectile damage.
When this card enters play, you may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: With all due respect, Mr. Liason, I{BR}don't see how you have jurisdiction, but{BR}I've been told [b]repeatedly[/b] not to ask.

cards.flavorReference: Malone, Division X: Friendly Fire One-Shot

cards.title: Updated Profile
body: Play this card next to a non-hero target.

When that target deals damage to a target other than the hero target with the highest HP, you may discard 2 cards. If you do, redirect that damage to the hero target with the highest HP. Reduce damage redirected this way by 1.
When that target leaves play, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: He won't stay hidden long.{BR}He needs to make a spectacle. He's got{BR}something planned for New Saxton, and{BR}he's still putting the pieces into place.'

cards.title: Witness Statements
body: Play this card next to a non-hero target. The first time each turn that target deals damage, 1 hero may use a power. When that target leaves play, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Last I saw o' her, she was{BR}headin' outta town, takin' that road{BR}by the forest. Tried to talk her out of it.{BR}Place gives me the creeps.

cards.flavorReference: Jones, Grim Tidings: Old Forest Road

cards.title: Word on the Street
body: At the start of each player's turn, you may discard 2 cards. If you do, damage dealt by that player's targets is irreducible until the end of the turn.

flavorQuotes.text: I got you the information{BR}you asked for. Just... try not{BR}to do anything crazy.
